group_1.textLeft: ...Hmmm.

group_1.textRight: Please have a look at the next page.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, oh yeah...

group_1.textRight: The next page and the next page...
All the signatures from the people who support me.

group_1.textLeft: Can't believe...that it's actually collected...
In addition, the student council approved the bill of@revising school regulations on the same day...
What kind of groundwork did you lay for this?

group_1.textRight: ...A secret.
Now, we only need teachers to have a faculty@meeting...
...and decide whether to recognize a 1st year's@candidacy or not.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, I know.
I'll call a special faculty meeting in a minute.

group_1.textRight: I appreciate it.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Yuna!!@How, how was it?!
The teachers, are they going to recognize Yuna's@candidacy?

group_1.textRight: It is obvious.
As the student council did, the teachers are no@exception.
Ignoring this amount of signatures from the@students...
...and becoming the villains is the last thing they@would want.

group_1.narration: The bill for recognizing a 1st year's candidacy@was passed in the special faculty meeting.
Then with the approval of the board of directors...
Yuna's candidacy has been recognized at last.

group_1.textRight: You did it!@Yuna!

group_1.textLeft: Yes... but, this is just the beginning, with one week@to go before the election day...
Do not lose concentration and fight it out to the end.

group_1.textRight: Yes!!

group_1.textLeft: Well then, let's resume our activities everyone.

group_1.textRight: ...Kirari, can we talk now?

group_1.textLeft: ...Teacher.
You are...

group_1.textRight: Sorry Kureha, but would you excuse us?

group_1.textLeft: I will be waiting outside the classroom.

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much.

group_1.textLeft: So, what's up?@I've collected the signatures properly.
Hikaru will continue campaigning no matter what@Teacher thinks.

group_1.textRight: About that...
Kirari, I accept your resignment.

group_1.textLeft: ...Huh?
W-wait a minute, what do you mean?

group_1.textRight: You said you want to quit, no?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I did but, why so sudden...

group_1.textRight: I told you right?
That I'll consider your resignment if you show@yourself going all out to something just for once.
You've definitely been serious with the election@campaign.
If you found something to get that much passionate@about other than lacrosse...
There's no need to tie you down.@...Well, that's what it is.

group_1.textLeft: ...I, I got that Hikaru has been serious with it...

group_1.textRight: You weren't aware of it?
You've been sparkling amazingly while running@around for Kureha.

group_1.textLeft: For...Yuna...
I see, that's it...
(The election campaign sure was fun, so I got@passionate about it before I knew it.)
(But, I had no idea it was something I could get@serious about...)
(Now I've finally realized it.)
(Hikaru got passionate about Yuna.)
Oh...
...Kyubey really granted me my wish, huh.

group_1.textRight: Wish?@What's that?

group_1.textLeft: It's a private matter.
Anyway thank you very much, Teacher.

group_1.textRight: Oh, yeah...
Then Kirari, do your best.

group_1.textCenter: (I finally got my hands on the one thing I can get@passionate about...)
(This time I'll never let it go!)
